comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Simply Amazing and love the chime as well...reminds be of those old grandfather clocks from way back in the day!¬† Great job as always! Wish I could spare the Sats for this....goodluck to whoever grabs it....congrats as well.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Incredible piece of art. Whoever has the sats to spare will have a timeless masterpiece in their hands (Dad-pun intended).Will there be a holo with private keys attached or is it inteded to just carry a public key to an private key stored somewhere else?

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: Quote from: Liquidoptions on May 29, 2023, 01:53:49 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on May 29, 2023, 09:35:35 AMIncredible piece of art. Whoever has the sats to spare will have a timeless masterpiece in their hands (Dad-pun intended).Will there be a holo with private keys attached or is it inteded to just carry a public key to an private key stored somewhere else?Werk, example is a choice of user given public addy, but will do funded for buyers choice with holo on back also if they prefer...I think a open dime would be the ideal way to do it. Be able to display the clock and stash the dime. That's why I love the ones that have a dime over the pk/holo.

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: The fact that this is still available. Definitely shows the economic times. This is unbelievable. Pure art. I sure wish I could swing it. Glws

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: Suzuki Matt on May 29, 2023, 02:18:11 PMThe fact that this is still available. Definitely shows the economic times. This is unbelievable. Pure art. I sure wish I could swing it. Glws I know it's a little OT, but anyone here involved in selling-goods also noticing a strong decline in sales? Seems to me this is not a crypto (collectible) specific occurrence. Spoke to a few vendors recently (from different countries, very different products), they were all complaining about a very noticeable/unusual drop in sales that started about 2 months ago. Quote from: Liquidoptions on May 29, 2023, 01:53:49 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on May 29, 2023, 09:35:35 AMIncredible piece of art. Whoever has the sats to spare will have a timeless masterpiece in their hands (Dad-pun intended).Will there be a holo with private keys attached or is it inteded to just carry a public key to an private key stored somewhere else?Werk, example is a choice of user given public addy, but will do funded for buyers choice with holo on back also if they prefer...Okay, pretty cool. I think in this case an open-dime or just pub-address version makes more sense.
